channel.title: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
channel.description:
I read through a tutorial from villu-reborn. Now I'm wondering how to make it click within a certain area in runescape. You can't use x,y because the runescape client could be minimized, maximized, different resolutions, etc. etc. so how would you make it, for example, click on the inventory?
Also, what functions will get you banned? I think I read somewhere that sendkeys will get you banned. Are there any others?

yah, thats why my procedure didn’t work.

item.title: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Uhh Bobby, In your script you have made a couple of mistakes. May i suggest on taking more SCAR lessons.
Here is the fixed part of the script.

procedure bobbyantibantalk(talk: string);
begin
wait(880+random(1000))
sendkeys(talk)
wait(1000)
end;

Your one did not have the wait in line 7. Did not have a begin in line 4 and a semicolon was expected in script on line 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned

item.title: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

uhh here is a simple way to make ur own anti ban talk proceudre:

procedure bobbyantibantalk(talk: string)
wait(880+random(1000))
sendkeys(talk)
wait(…
end;

get it?

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:3, topic:67647”][quote author=bustinthejus link=topic=98905.msg1011245#msg1011245 date=1173862410]
I read through a tutorial from villu-reborn. Now I’m wondering how to make it click within a certain area in runescape. You can’t use x,y because the runescape client could be minimized, maximized, different resolutions, etc. etc. so how would you make it, for example, click on the inventory?

Also, what functions will get you banned? I think I read somewhere that sendkeys will get you banned. Are there any others?
[/quote]

It dosen’t matter what resolution or what size the browser is, the screen co-ordinates will be the same.[/quote]

But you still shouldn’t use coordinates because it’s pretty detecable if “you” click at exatcly same place everytime.

Read full topic

item.source: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned

item.title: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“bustinthejus, post:1, topic:67647”]I read through a tutorial from villu-reborn. Now I’m wondering how to make it click within a certain area in runescape. You can’t use x,y because the runescape client could be minimized, maximized, different resolutions, etc. etc. so how would you make it, for example, click on the inventory?

Also, what functions will get you banned? I think I read somewhere that sendkeys will get you banned. Are there any others?[/quote]

How about use bitmaps or the FindColor function (Maybe use FindColor but there is a heap of the same colours used in Runescape), but you should really use bitmaps.

Yes, Sendkeys will get you banned because it sends all of the keys at once. So you need to do some human like auto typing.

For example you can use the sleep function:

Program HumanLike_AutoTyping;

Procedure SendKeys_More_HumanLike; //Procedure name to start the script
Begin
SendKeys(‘Sending keys more human like’); //Will type the sentence using the sleep function.
Sleep(50 +Random(59)); //Will send each key slowly
Wait(1000)
end;

begin
repeat
SendKeys_More_HumanLike; //Procedure name in main line.
[b]Until/b
end. //End the entire script.

That script above will send the text more human like. You can copy and paste it into SCAR and test it!
Anyways, i don’t really use autotypers.

NOTE: Pretty sure the script will work, not tested

Read full topic
item.source: Clicking things in rs and functions that will make you banned
